item.title: 国债市场实现历史性的五个月连胜
item.description: 美国政府债券有望在 9 月结束时连续第五个月实现历史性上涨，尽管债券交易员们认为美联储明年可能采取的宽松政策略有减少。【原文：US government bonds are on track to end September with a historic fifth-straight monthly gain even as bond traders pared slightly the amount of Federal Reserve easing they consider likely over the next year.】

item.title: 刺激政策出台前，9 月中国房屋销售下滑加剧
item.description: 在中国政府发布一揽子措施以缓解长达数年的房地产危机之前，中国住宅市场的低迷在 9 月份进一步加深。【原文：China’s residential slump deepened in September before the government released a basket of measures to put a floor under the yearslong property crisis.】

item.title: 费尔法克斯与德斯马莱斯家族达成协议，获得曲棍球装备制造商鲍尔的控制权
item.description: 加拿大费尔法克斯金融控股有限公司（Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd.）将与蒙特利尔德斯马莱斯家族旗下的一家投资管理公司达成协议，收购冰球设备制造商 Peak Achievement Athletics Inc.【原文：Canada’s Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd. will acquire control of hockey-equipment maker Peak Achievement Athletics Inc. in a deal with an investment manager owned by Montreal’s Desmarais family.】

item.title: 白金股权投资支持的科技公司英迈申请 IPO
item.description: Platinum Equity 支持的技术公司英迈控股公司（Ingram Micro Holding Corp.【原文：Platinum Equity-backed technology company Ingram Micro Holding Corp. filed for an initial public offering, as companies rush to make their public debuts ahead of the US presidential election in November.】

item.title: 北京跟随中国主要城市放宽购房规定
item.description: 北京市成为中国四个所谓的一线城市中最新一个放宽购房规定的城市，以响应中央政府为房地产市场下滑打下底线的号召。【原文：The city of Beijing became the latest of China’s four so-called tier-one cities to ease rules for homebuyers, following through on the central government’s call to put a floor under the property market decline.】

item.title: 交易商关注特拉菲古拉头寸，铝价差再次跳涨
item.description: 铝市场的挤压有加剧的迹象，贸易商因特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）的大举买入和一家仓储公司提高关键费用的争议性决定而倍感压力。【原文：A squeeze in the aluminum market showed signs of intensifying, adding pressure on traders caught out by a spurt of buying by Trafigura Group and a warehousing company’s controversial decision to hike a key fee.】

item.title: 英国需要现金。英国财政大臣里夫斯的创新之举
item.description: 英国公共服务因多年投资不足而瘫痪，税收负担已达到二战后的最高水平，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）警告说，她面临着平衡国家财政的 "艰难决定"。【原文：With UK public services failing due to years of under-investment and the tax burden already at a post-World War II high, Chancellor Rachel Reeves has warned she faces “tough decisions” to balance the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 交易商关注巴西降雨，食糖和咖啡价格下跌
item.description: 咖啡和原糖的期货价格回落，原因是在本月价格上涨之后，下周降雨将有助于头号出口国巴西的农作物生长的前景带来了一些缓解。【原文：Futures for coffee and raw sugar retreated as the prospect for rainfall aiding crops at top exporter Brazil next week brought some relief after prices rallied this month.】

item.title: Steward Health 首席执行官就藐视调查结论起诉参议院委员会
item.description: 破产的 Steward 医疗保健系统的首席执行官兼创始人拉尔夫-德拉托雷（Ralph de la Torre）起诉了美国参议院调查该连锁医院财务崩溃的委员会。【原文：Ralph de la Torre, the embattled chief executive officer and founder of the bankrupt Steward Health Care System, sued a US Senate committee probing the hospital chain’s financial collapse.】

item.title: 伦敦法院批准英国电影世界重组计划
item.description: 尽管遭到一些连锁影院业主的反对，但伦敦法官还是为电影世界英国分公司在重组中削减租金成本的计划开了绿灯。【原文：A plan by Cineworld’s UK arm to slash rent costs in a restructuring was given the green light by a London judge, in spite of opposition from some of the cinema chain’s landlords.】

item.title: 液化天然气供应商新丰泰推迟支付股息后股价下跌
item.description: 新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Shares of New Fortress Energy Inc. plunged as much as 16% after the US-based natural gas provider delayed its dividend payment.】

item.title: 风险上升，私人借贷者筹集了有史以来最多的高等级债务
item.description: 今年，私人信贷领域的巨头们筹集了有史以来最多的投资级债务，而此时它们的现金已达到创纪录的水平，并且正在努力与竞争对手银行保持竞争。【原文：The biggest names in private credit have raised the most investment-grade debt ever this year, at a time when they already have record levels of cash and are fighting to stay competitive with rival banks.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织承诺支持孟加拉国经济稳定改革
item.description: 在孟加拉国努力减轻外汇储备压力之际，国际货币基金组织承诺与孟加拉国临时政府合作，以恢复经济稳定。【原文：The International Monetary Fund pledged to work with Bangladesh’s interim government to regain economic stability as the country struggles to reduce pressure on foreign exchange reserves.】

item.title: 盖兰特告诉坦克兵他们将帮助平息以色列-黎巴嫩边境冲突
item.description: 以色列国防部长约阿夫-加兰特（Yoav Gallant）表示，地面部队将成为从黎巴嫩南部清除真主党的努力的一部分，这表明越境入侵可能即将发生。【原文：Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Gallant said ground forces would be part of efforts to remove Hezbollah from southern Lebanon, an indication that incursions across the border may be coming.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会援引欧佩克禁令禁止约翰-赫斯进入雪佛龙董事会
item.description: 美国监管机构将允许雪佛龙公司以 530 亿美元收购赫斯公司，但禁止首席执行官约翰-赫斯加入这家超级巨头的董事会，称他与欧佩克进行了不当沟通。【原文：US regulators will allow Chevron Corp. to move forward with its $53 billion acquisition of Hess Corp. but are barring Chief Executive Officer John Hess from joining the supermajor’s board, saying he improperly communicated with OPEC.】

item.title: 诺沃亚纽约之行因大火中断，厄瓜多尔债券受挫
item.description: 厄瓜多尔六十多年来最严重的干旱导致森林大火、全国停电，并迫使其领导人缩短了纽约之行。现在，投资者担心他的支持率会受到打击。【原文：Ecuador’s worst drought in over six decades has led to forest fires, nationwide blackouts and forced its leader to shorten a New York visit. It now has investors fearing his approval ratings will take a hit.】

item.title: 中矿集团称将在津巴布韦建设硫酸锂工厂
item.description: 中矿资源集团有限公司（Sinomine Resource Group Co., Ltd.）的津巴布韦分公司计划在未来 3-5 年内建造一座价值 5 亿美元的锂精炼厂，尽管该公司目前因金属价格疲软而亏损。【原文：Sinomine Resource Group Co.’s Zimbabwean unit plans to build a $500 million lithium refinery in the next 3-5 years, even as the company currently loses money due to weak metal prices.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团支持的幼儿园寻求最高 6.48 亿美元的 IPO
item.description: KinderCare Learning Cos.公司（KinderCare Learning Cos. Inc.【原文：KinderCare Learning Cos. Inc. is seeking to raise $648 million in an initial public offering, which could give it a market value of as much as $3.1 billion.】

item.title: 毛里求斯雨果博斯供应商依靠印度部门推动增长
item.description: 总部设在毛里求斯的企业集团 Ciel Ltd. 计划将其印度纺织厂的产量提高约三分之一，以增加对雨果博斯、Lacoste 和 Superdry 等品牌的供应。【原文：Ciel Ltd., a Mauritian-based conglomerate, plans to increase output at its textile factories in India by about a third to boost supply to brands including Hugo Boss, Lacoste and Superdry.】

item.title: 拉加德支持银行合并，欧洲央行为联合信贷银行判决做准备
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，她更加支持欧元区的国际银行业合作，认为这种合作可以带来许多好处，包括提高与外国竞争对手竞争的能力。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde reinforced her support for international banking tie-ups in the euro zone, saying they can produce many upsides including a greater ability to compete with foreign rivals.】

item.title: 主席称 Codelco 的铜产量已开始恢复
item.description: Codelco 的产量已开始从低迷中复苏，这使其世界最大铜矿商的地位受到质疑，该公司董事长表示，8 月和 9 月的产量同比有所增长。【原文：Codelco’s output has begun to recover from a slump that has thrown its status as the world’s largest copper miner into doubt, with the company’s chairman saying production rose year-on-year in August and September.】

item.title: 欧佩克最小成员国计划在埃克森退出后恢复石油产量
item.description: 赤道几内亚是欧佩克（OPEC）最小的产油国，该国石油部长表示，在埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）今年早些时候从这个中非国家撤出后，该国计划提高石油和天然气产量。【原文：Equatorial Guinea, OPEC’s smallest producer, plans to boost oil and gas output following the exit of Exxon Mobil Corp. from the Central African nation earlier this year, according to its oil minister.】

item.title: 前 LTCM 元老哈加尼加入申购动态指数的 ETF 热潮
item.description: 前 LTCM 创始人维克多-哈加尼（Victor Haghani）已申请 ETF，加入了最近为这种流行投资工具正名的一连串财富经理和策略师的行列。【原文：Ex-LTCM founder Victor Haghani has filed for an ETF, joining a string of wealth managers and strategists who have recently put their names behind the popular investment vehicle.】

item.title: 软银将向 OpenAI 投资 5 亿美元，信息报道
item.description: 据 The Information 周一援引一位熟悉该交易的人士的话报道，软银愿景基金计划向 OpenAI 投资 5 亿美元，作为更大规模融资的一部分。【原文：SoftBank’s Vision Fund is planning to invest $500 million in OpenAI as part of a larger funding round, the Information reported on Monday, citing a person familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 布林肯称没有纳斯鲁拉的中东更安全，敦促开展外交活动
item.description: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）表示，在以色列击毙真主党领导人哈桑-纳斯鲁拉（Hassan Nasrallah）之后，中东变得更加安全，随着局势的升级，美国将继续推动外交解决方案。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken said the Middle East is safer after Israel killed Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah and that the US is continuing to push for a diplomatic solution as the situation escalates.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行对抑制通胀更有信心
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行对控制通胀的前景越来越乐观，并将在 10 月份的利率决议中对此进行反思。【原文：Christine Lagarde said the European Central Bank is becoming more optimistic that it will be able to get inflation under control, and will reflect on that at its October decision on interest rates.】

item.title: 德国铁路称 CVC 最后一次尝试的申克出价 "低劣
item.description: 德国铁路股份公司（Deutsche Bahn AG）称，私募股权基金 CVC Capital Partners Plc.在截止日期后提交的出价仍 "低于 "获胜者的出价，这是其物流部门 143 亿欧元（160 亿美元）争夺战的最新进展。【原文：Deutsche Bahn AG said bids submitted after the deadline by private equity fund CVC Capital Partners Plc. remain “inferior” to the winner’s offer, the latest twist in the €14.3 billion ($16 billion) battle for its logistics unit.】

item.title: CVS 在与投资者格伦维尤会面的报道后上涨
item.description: 据报道，CVS Health Corp. 公司高管将于周一与投资者 Glenview Capital Management 公司会面，商讨如何在股价长期下跌的情况下改善经营状况，随后该公司股价大涨。【原文：CVS Health Corp. shares jumped after a report that executives will meet Monday with investor Glenview Capital Management on how it can improve operations amid a long drop in share value.】

item.title: 在 250 家美国公司中，福特公司面临的中国风险最大
item.description: 根据《战略风险》（Strategy Risks）的调查，随着中美两国在从科技到军事实力等各个方面的对峙，福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co.【原文：As the US and China square off over everything from tech to military might, Ford Motor Co. has emerged as the American firm most at risk from its exposure to the world’s No. 2 economy, according to Strategy Risks, beating the likes of Apple Inc. and Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 中国股市大涨，量化对冲基金面临更多追加保证金要求
item.description: 中国股市十多年来的最大涨幅给中国的量化对冲基金增加了压力。【原文：China’s biggest stock market rally in more than a decade has added pressure on the nation’s quantitative hedge funds.】
